targets.expr:
sum(kube_node_status_condition{condition!="Ready", status!="false"})
+
sum(kube_node_spec_unschedulable)
sum(kube_node_status_condition{condition!="Ready", status!="false"}) by (condition)
sum(kube_node_spec_unschedulable)
sum(kube_node_info)
sum(kube_node_role) by (role)
sum(topk(1,kube_node_role{role="worker"}) by (node)) - sum(topk(1,kube_node_role{role="infra"}) by (node))
sum(topk(1,kube_node_role{role="infra"}) by (node))
sum(topk(1,kube_node_role{role="master"}) by (node))

100
/
(
sum(kube_node_status_allocatable{resource="cpu"} * on(node) group_left(role) kube_node_role{role="worker"})
-
avg(kube_node_status_allocatable{resource="cpu"} * on(node) group_left(role) kube_node_role{role="worker"}) * $sparenodesfactor
)
*
sum(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode!="idle"}[5m]) * on(instance) group_left(node) (label_replace((node_uname_info), "node", "$1", "nodename", "(.*)") * on(node) group_left(role) kube_node_role{role="worker"}))

topk(1,
  100
  /
  sum(kube_node_status_allocatable{resource="cpu"} * on(node) group_left(role) kube_node_role{role="$noderole"}) by (node)
  *
  sum(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode!="idle"}[5m]) * on(instance) group_left(node) (label_replace((node_uname_info), "node", "$1", "nodename", "(.*)") * on(node) group_left(role) kube_node_role{role="$noderole"})) by (node)
)

sum(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode!="idle"}[5m]) * on(instance) group_left(node) (label_replace(topk(1,node_uname_info) by (instance), "node", "$1", "nodename", "(.*)") * on(node) group_left(role) topk(1,kube_node_role{role="$noderole"}) by (node))) by (node)

100
/
(
  sum(kube_node_status_allocatable{resource="memory"} * on(node) group_left(role) kube_node_role{role="$noderole"})
  -
  avg(kube_node_status_allocatable{resource="memory"} * on(node) group_left() kube_node_role{role="$noderole"})
  * $sparenodesfactor
)
*
(
  sum(node_memory_MemTotal_bytes{job="node-exporter"} * on(instance) group_left(node) (label_replace((node_uname_info), "node", "$1", "nodename", "(.*)") * on(node) group_left(role) kube_node_role{role="$noderole"}))
  -
  sum(node_memory_MemAvailable_bytes{job="node-exporter"} * on(instance) group_left(node) (label_replace((node_uname_info), "node", "$1", "nodename", "(.*)") * on(node) group_left(role) kube_node_role{role="$noderole"}))
)

topk(1,
  100
  /
  sum(kube_node_status_allocatable{resource="memory"} * on(node) group_left(role) kube_node_role{role="$noderole"}) by (node)
  *
  (
  sum(node_memory_MemTotal_bytes{job="node-exporter"} * on(instance) group_left(node) (label_replace((node_uname_info), "node", "$1", "nodename", "(.*)") * on(node) group_left(role) kube_node_role{role="$noderole"})) by (node)
  -
  sum(node_memory_MemAvailable_bytes{job="node-exporter"} * on(instance) group_left(node) (label_replace((node_uname_info), "node", "$1", "nodename", "(.*)") * on(node) group_left(role) kube_node_role{role="$noderole"})) by (node)
  )
)

sum(node_memory_MemTotal_bytes{job="node-exporter"} * on(instance) group_left(node) (label_replace(topk(1,node_uname_info) by (instance), "node", "$1", "nodename", "(.*)") * on(node) group_left(role) topk(1,kube_node_role{role="$noderole"}) by (node))) by (node)
-
sum(node_memory_MemAvailable_bytes{job="node-exporter"} * on(instance) group_left(node) (label_replace(topk(1,node_uname_info) by (instance), "node", "$1", "nodename", "(.*)") * on(node) group_left(role) topk(1,kube_node_role{role="$noderole"}) by (node))) by (node)

sum(rate(node_disk_read_bytes_total[5m]) * on(instance) group_left(node) (label_replace((node_uname_info), "node", "$1", "nodename", "(.*)") * on(node) group_left(role) kube_node_role{role="$noderole"}))

sum(rate(node_disk_written_bytes_total[5m]) * on(instance) group_left(node) (label_replace((node_uname_info), "node", "$1", "nodename", "(.*)") * on(node) group_left(role) kube_node_role{role="$noderole"}))

sum(rate(node_disk_read_bytes_total[5m]) * on(instance) group_left(node) (label_replace(topk(1,node_uname_info) by (instance), "node", "$1", "nodename", "(.*)") * on(node) group_left(role) topk(1,kube_node_role{role="$noderole"}) by (node))) by (node)

sum(rate(node_disk_written_bytes_total[5m]) * on(instance) group_left(node) (label_replace(topk(1,node_uname_info) by (instance), "node", "$1", "nodename", "(.*)") * on(node) group_left(role) topk(1,kube_node_role{role="$noderole"}) by (node))) by (node) * -1

sum(rate(node_network_receive_bytes_total[5m]) * on(instance) group_left(node) (label_replace((node_uname_info), "node", "$1", "nodename", "(.*)") * on(node) group_left(role) kube_node_role{role="$noderole"}))

sum(rate(node_network_transmit_bytes_total[5m]) * on(instance) group_left(node) (label_replace((node_uname_info), "node", "$1", "nodename", "(.*)") * on(node) group_left(role) kube_node_role{role="$noderole"}))

sum(rate(node_network_receive_bytes_total[5m]) * on(instance) group_left(node) (label_replace((node_uname_info), "node", "$1", "nodename", "(.*)") * on(node) group_left(role) topk(1,kube_node_role{role="$noderole"}) by (node))) by (node)

sum(rate(node_network_transmit_bytes_total[5m]) * on(instance) group_left(node) (label_replace((node_uname_info), "node", "$1", "nodename", "(.*)") * on(node) group_left(role) topk(1,kube_node_role{role="$noderole"}) by (node))) by (node) * -1

options.content:
- CPU / Memory allocatable (brutto) = Total allocatable  
- CPU / Memory allocatable (netto) = Total allocatable - spare nodes ---> All requested, used and limits values are calculated with the allocatable (netto) values
